item.title: Quantifying uncertainty in brain-predicted age using scalar-on-image quantile regression
IM-AGE
item.description: Tensor-based morphometry (TBM) is an imaging technique that aims at showing local differences in brain volume with respect to a common template. TBM images are smooth but they exhibit (especially in diseased group) higher values in some brain regions called lateral ventricles. The study of TBM images might inform about ageing effects and neurodegenerative diseases.
